payback.estimatedPoints: With this order you can collect {count} PAYBACK points.
payback.excludedCustomerGroup: Unfortunately, it is not possible for employees to participate in PAYBACK.

cart.headline: Collect PAYBACK °Points
cart.text: Enter your 10-digit PAYBACK number to collect {count} PAYBACK points with this purchase.
cart.paybackInfo: Bitte beachte: Das Sammeln von PAYBACK Punkten ist ausschließlich mit PAYBACK Karten möglich, die in in Deutschland registriert sind.
cart.numberValidatedText: With this purchase you collect {count} PAYBACK points.
cart.inputError: Your PAYBACK customer number is not correct.

modal.headline: Where do I find my PAYBACK number?
modal.content:
Enter your 10 digit PAYBACK customer number to collect points.

You can find your PAYBACK number on the backside of your PAYBACK card. Please enter the number without spaces.

cart.scrid: With this purchase you collect {count} PAYBACK points. Your PAYBACK customer number is stored for this purchase.

confirmation.validCustomerId:
With this order you collect { paybackPoints } PAYBACK Points.
Extra points will be displayed in your PAYBACK customer account if a suitable coupon was activated by you before your order.
confirmation.invalidCustomerId: With this order you would have collected { paybackPoints } PAYBACK Points

promotionCode.info: Extra points will be displayed in your PAYBACK customer account if you activated a valid PAYBACK action code before placing your order.

errors.tooManyCharacters: The code you entered is too long
errors.invalid: This promotion code does not exist
errors.tooManyCodes: Only 5 promotion codes can be used per order

modal.removePaybackNumberInfo: If you delete your PAYBACK number, the promotion codes you entered will not be taken into account. Do you still want to delete your PAYBACK number?
